thread.title: Former AOL Exec Lists Home for $15 Million

author: Candace Taylor
title: Former AOL Exec Lists Home for $15 Million
text:
Internet pioneer Steve Johnson, a tech entrepreneur and former AOL executive, is listing his mid-1800s home in Cambridge, Mass., for $15 million, making it one of the most-expensive homes on the market in the Boston area.

The three-story, Greek Revival-style house sits about a mile from Harvard University, where Mr. Johnson received a masterâ€™s degree in public policy in 1985. He later moved to California and founded the Newport Beach-based Johnson-Grace Co., which developed digital data-compression technologies. The company...
